title: Bayer Hosts Making Science Make Sense Workshop For Teachers At Kansas City's Science Center, Science ...
text: ( Source : Bayer Corporation ) KANSAS CITY , Mo., Oct. 12, 2015 / PRNewswire / -- As a science-based company, Bayer recognizes its responsibility to help improve science educaton and promote science literacy across the country. To expand on the
